<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Change header_label column type from string to translated_field</description>
        <name>Change Branding header column type</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[updateColumnType("header_label");

function updateColumnType(element) {
    var gr = new GlideRecord("sys_dictionary");
    gr.addQuery("name", "sys_cs_branding_setup");
    gr.addQuery("internal_type", "string");
    gr.addQuery("element", element);
    gr.setWorkflow(false);
    gr.query();
    if (gr.next()) {
        gr.setValue("internal_type", "translated_field");
        gr.update();
    }
}]]></script>
